official_title: A resolution to recognize the successful resettlement of hundreds of unaccompanied Haitian children.

summary.text: Recognizes the Greer-Woodycrest Children's Services for its meritorious services in resettling unaccompanied Haitian children.

titles.title: A resolution to recognize the successful resettlement of hundreds of unaccompanied Haitian children.
